QuestData.Title: Forgotten Rituals
QuestData.Description: Every year we, the denizens of Suncrown Village, would take part in a ritual to keep the different aspects of nature under our control. Dominion over the element of water was symbolized by the summoning and enslavement of an elemental named Aquantion. Through a wicked perversion of our magic, the scoundrel broke his bonds and enslaved us instead!$B$BWe wore medallions shaped like waves during the ritual. Seek them at the bottom of the lake; we'll need them to free my compatriots' spirits!
QuestData.LogDescription: Bring 8 Wavefront Medallions to Geranis Whitemorn in the Ghostlands.
QuestData.CompletionText: Have you obtained the medallions? The drowned still haunt this lake!
QuestData.RewardText: With these necklaces we shall once again summon Aquantion. The rebellious elemental will pay and our deaths will be avenged!
